name: Fasteroids (OmegaFalcon)
description:
Ngl, this theme was hard for me. (GMTK 2021 GameJam)

I made asteroids! But in this game, the asteroid speed is tied to the players speed. You could say the two speeds are... joined together? When you move faster, the asteroids move faster, so be careful! While the controls here are rough, I think there's the seed of a great game here, so I'll improve it over time.

Music: Kubbi - Digestive Biscuit

Art/Sfx: Me

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows to turn

Up Arrow to move

Space to shoot
